title: Sensor-Monitor Recovery Action Configuration File
description: The schema for Sensor-Monitor Recovery Action Configuration File. It decides which sensors should trigger Recovery Action, and what kinds of thresholds should be watched.

target.description: The target/service to be executed when a Recovery Action is triggered.

sensors.description: The sensors configurations which trigger Recovery Action.

alarm.description: The alarm's property of the sensor.

stableCountdown.description: The countdown time (Milliseconds) for recovery when the sensor is back to normal, make sure that the sensor is stable.
